## PAckages

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

```
## Data Import
```{r}
claims <- read_csv("claims.csv")
claims

```
## Data Cleaning
```{r}
claims_clean <- claims %>%
filter(DEPARTMENTID >= 6L & DEPARTMENTID <= 20L)
```

## Data Visualizations
```{r}
ggplot(claims_clean) +
  aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()
```


```{r}
dv1 <- ggplot(claims_clean) +
  aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()
dv1
```
